attributes.name: color
attributes.description: Change the color of the component and some of its sub components.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Change the style of the component and its states.

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: Determine if the component is active and change its style to that state.

attributes.name: upload
attributes.description: Determine if the component has the upload status active by changing the style and adding the animation.

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: Add an href of an external link to add the functionality by clicking on the component.

attributes.name: blank
attributes.description: as in an html element `a` determines whether a new window is opened or the current one is replaced.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: Determine if the component contains only one icon, by adding this property the component has an equal width and height.

attributes.name: circle
attributes.description: Change the border radius to give a circle style.

slots.name: animate
slots.description: Slot To add the element that will be displayed in the animation.
